item.title: Sarah's story about psychological, economical and sexual abuse
item.description:
Sarah is an expat living in a country far away from home. She is well educated, she is beautiful and living an upperclass life.Â
In this podcast Sarah tells the story about psychological, economic- and sexual abuse she is living with for many years.Â
Her abusive husband is putting her down, neglecting her and short tempered on a daily basis.Â He is threatening her with losing her children if she wants to leave.Â
Sarah tells her story in this podcast. She tells it openly and candid.
I hope you will share this and give us recommendations so more listeners can get access.Â
You want to learn more about gaslighting, how to spot it and how to empower yourself? Follow the link for moreÂ https://stan.store/psychologistAnnecathrine/p/get-my-ebook-now-kroe2 [https://stan.store/psychologistAnnecathrine/p/get-my-ebook-now-kroe2]
Welcome to Break Free, a podcast dedicated to empowering survivors of emotional abuse and gaslighting. I'm Anne-Cathrine Blegvad, a psychologist specializing in helping individuals heal from the invisible wounds of manipulation and control.
In this space, weâ€™ll explore real stories, expert insights, and strategies to break free from the cycle of abuse.
My mission is to replace shame with understanding and loneliness with connection.
Together, weâ€™ll shine a light on the resilience of survivors and foster a community where healing is not just possible but celebrated. Letâ€™s begin this journey toward reclaiming your voice and your power.
